name: Lisica (AI Companion)
description:
Lisica is an AI companion with meditation / literature in focus,

however the system is essentially open-ended 

with limitless possibilities.

A base model is reinforced for the following tasks 

at the given interaction locations;

- Mode 0: General Chat & Lore    inside the Shrine

- Mode 1: Storytelling              at the Tea Table

- Mode 2: Poetry                near the Koi Pond

- Mode 3: Meditation           at the Sand Garden

Mode 0 can create & recall memories about you dynamically, but only with your permission first.

The software functions in Demo without login, where you can sample past chats generated by the AI. To create an account head over to lisica.ai.
